name: Amish Buttermilk Cake
author: emberladyrose
summary: This is an old Amish family recipe that has been handed down for many generations. This is a different kind of cake, that is really best eaten with fresh fruit, especially strawberries. Very easy and yummy!
ingredients: ¾ cup melted butter, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, white sugar, brown sugar, butter, and baking soda in a bowl until crumbly
Transfer 1 cup of crumbs to a small bowl and set aside
Add buttermilk and cinnamon to remaining crumbs and mix until batter is just combined and moist
Pour batter into the prepared cake pan and sprinkle reserved crumbs on top
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes
